issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Decimal type should be casted as part of the CTAS or INSERT Clause.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Currently, a decimal column is indexed as double in druid.
This should not happen and either the user has to add an explicit cast or we can add a flag to enable approximation.
fields.summary: Hive Druid indexing not dealing with decimals in correct way.
